mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM ks_board_sinmungo WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.HIT , B.REG_ID , B.REG_DTTM , FILE_NO , FILE_SEQ , FILE_NM , FILE_DIR FROM ks_board_sinmungo B LEFT JOIN KS_FILE F ON B.BOARD_NO = F.BOARD_NO AND B.BOARD_TYPE = F.BOARD_TYPE AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}

SELECT BOARD_NO AS prevNo , TITLE AS prevTitle FROM ks_board_sinmungo WHERE BOARD_NO = ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM ks_board_sinmungo WHERE BOARD_NO < #{boardNo} AND BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 1 )

SELECT BOARD_NO AS nextNo , TITLE AS nextTitle FROM ks_board_sinmungo WHERE BOARD_NO = ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM ks_board_sinmungo WHERE BOARD_NO > #{boardNo} AND BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 1 )
